definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
mugwort leaf oil (TCM)/also called wormwood leaf oil/Oleum folii Artemisiae argyi
carbonized mugwort leaf (used in TCM)/Folium Artemisiae argyi carbonisatum

sentences.english: Along with the time progress, is more comprehensive thoroughly to the leaf's research and the application.
sentences.chinese: 随著时代的进步，对艾叶的研究和应用更全面深入。

sentences.english: Every year my family hangs By Tsao on their front door.
sentences.chinese: 每年我的家人都会挂艾叶在前门。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the chemical constituents of the volatile oil from Artemisia argyi Levl.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析艾叶挥发油的主要化学成分。

sentences.english: Some places put a few pieces leaves when cooking garlic and eggs.
sentences.chinese: 有的地方，还在煮大蒜和鸡蛋时放几片艾叶。

definition: black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
